pkgmetadata.longdescription: The /DC Label/ (DCLabel) library provides dynamic information flow control label format in the form of conjunctions of disjunctions of principals. Most code should import module "DCLabel.Safe"; trusted code should import "DCLabel.TCB". The core functionality of the library is documented in "DCLabel.Core", while the small EDSL used to create labels is documents in "DCLabel.NanoEDSL". DCLabel was implemented by David Mazieres (<http://www.scs.stanford.edu/~dm/>), Deian Stefan (<http://www.scs.stanford.edu/~deian/>), and Alejandro Russo (<http://www.cse.chalmers.se/~russo/>).
